subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Lane Kiffin’s first game against Florida as the coach of Tennessee got much more interesting Thursday. Kiffin, the Volunteers’ new coach, was reprimanded by the Southeastern Conference, and he issued an apology after he falsely accused Florida Coach Urban Meyer of a recruiting violation. Earlier in the day, Kiffin told fans at a breakfast celebrating the Volunteers’ recruiting class that Meyer violated rules by calling a prospect who was on an official visit at Tennessee.
